message.body: Hey hey hey! How was DC???
It was good!!! Didn't get to do much, but it was nice. Couldn't get sushi.
Next time :) how was the weather down there? How's Seyer doing?
The weather was great. Warm actually. But he's doing good. He's dealing with a lot less snow than we are, that's for sure
Some people! Did you have to go in today?
I did but I got to leave at 1. We're trying to figure out whether or not we'll have off tomorrow. I'm debating just taking off anyway.
*the nerve of some people
Hahah "some people".
Yea, it's going to keep snowing apparently. I heard commuting has been pretty bad for a lot of people. Comon Polar Vortex!
Haha. I know. It's bad.
Shit, John kind of got in an accident.
Uhh you can't just say that and not write anything else.
He's filling me in.
He slipped in ice and hit the median.
*on
The back of his car is messed up.
Oh no!! Is he okay?
He just got home. I told him to go get checked, just in case.
I'm not sure about the severity of everything.
Oh man. Well as long as he's okay!
I agree. Damn.
Sucks!
My boss is such a diva. SUCH A DIVA! Because of that. I didn't go into work. I hope you didn't have to work.
